title: For Sale:  BNIB STEVENS SAVAGE ARMS MODEL 320 12G PUMP SHOTGUN - PISTOL GRIP - GHOST RING SIGHTS
postcontent:
This weapon is perfect for Home Defense. With the 18 1/2" barrel you can maneuver around the doors and hallway of your home. Protect Yourself. Don't expect anyone else to protect your home, property or family in a break-in situation, as the response time for assistance takes too long. I very recently had about $1000 worth of stuff stolen by my garage. I figured I would just call the insurance company and they would take care of my loss. NOPE, The theft deductible is 1% of the value of your home. So if you have a $150,000 home, the 1st $1500 comes out of your pocket, so I got nothing back for my loss. I will tell you that if someone breaks into my home, I will shoot to kill....not shoot to wound. I don't want them coming back later. A shotgun shell is less than 50 cents and that is now my new insurance policy against theft.
STEVENS SAVAGE ARMS MODEL 320 12G PUMP SHOTGUN WITH PISTOL GRIP, GHOST RING SIGHTS- NEW IN UNOPENED BOX $240.00. The pictures I have attached are only stock pictures. The box is sealed and whoever buys it will be the first to open the box since manufacturing and it will look just like the ones in the pictures. Walmart sells a version of this shotgun with the inexpensive bead sights for $207.00 + tax ($226.49) with background check. The Ghost Ring Sights model runs an additional $35.00 + over the bead sight model and is favored. This model is not carried by Walmart as they only sell the cheaper model. Be legal to buy a shotgun and have your FL drivers license with you. I will fill out a bill of sale.

The Savage Stevens 320 12 Gauge Pump-Action Shotgun features a carbon steel barrel and a synthetic stock, both with a matte black finish. The shotgun is designed with a pistol grip, a rotary bolt, dual slide bars and a Ghost Ring Sight. Tube magazine. 5-round capacity.

Simple, economical, functional, the 12 Gauge Stevens 320 Security is a capable home defense shotgun. Incorporating dual action bars and proven rotary bolt design this shotgun has an 18.5" barrel with ghost ring sights. Additionally the 320 utilizes a 3" chamber and fixed cylinder bore.

postcontent:
The FN-PS90 is known for its awesome round and incredible accuracy. Light weight with little to no recoil. Compact for maneuverability. This is a high quality firearm that I purchased a couple years ago. Due to the rarity of the ammo following the ammo shortages I have shot only about 200 rounds through the gun. It functions perfectly and is truly one of the best crafted firearms one can own. Included in the purchase will be all the original contents of the box (including the box itself), plus 6 clips (These were still $60 each when I bought them) and 9 unused boxes of 50 rounds of HP ammo each. That's a total of 750 rounds of HP ammo! This ammo is hard to find right now (in my area anyway), and is fairly unique to this and the FN Five-Seven handgun. I will throw in a partial box with about 20-30 rounds left in it.

If you’re considering this rifle you are probably aware of the many revolutionary traits of this civilian version of infamous P90. Below are some of the many features of this weapon platform.

•	Closed bolt, blowback operation
•	Hammer-forged, chrome-lined barrel w/ ported muzzle brake
•	Bottom ejection port
•	Blowback operated action
•	Alloy upper receiver and barrel support
•	Synthetic thumbhole bullpup design w/ forward handstop
•	Molded-in rear sling attachment point
•	Ambidextrous Charging Handles
•	Ambidextrous safety switch inside trigger guard
•	Enlarged trigger guard
•	Ambidextrous magazine release
•	Translucent polymer body available in 10, 30, or 50-round capacity
•	MIL-STD 1913 accessory rail with integrated back-up iron sight
•	Includes (1) 30 round magazine. Colorado residents receive a complete magazine parts repair kit. Know any magazine capacity limiting laws for your area. 

I will sell everything for $1600. This is a fair deal, as far as I can tell, based on the pricing I'm seeing on other firearms of this type.

Cash only please. Transfer in person only. If you live far away you HAVE TO share the driving.

title: For Sale:  Kel-Tec KSG
postcontent:
From the Kel-Tec website: The KSG (Kel-Tec Shotgun) is Kel-Tec CNC’s first entry into the shotgun market. The size, shape, and design is similar to the currently available Kel-Tec RFB rifle, but the KSG ejects downward, instead of forward. The KSG weighs 6.9 lbs. and is as compact as legally possible with a 26.1” overall length and an 18.5” cylinder bore barrel. Even with this compact size, the internal dual tube magazines hold an impressive 12 rounds of 12 gauge 3” rounds in total (6 per tube). It can also reliably shoot shells as short as 1 3/4" up to the 3".
This simple and reliable pump action feeds from either the left or right tube. The feed side is manually selected by a lever located behind the trigger guard.

The pump includes an under picatinny rail for the mounting of a forward grip, a light, or a laser. The included top picatinny sight rail will accept many types of optics or iron sights. Forward and rear sling loops are built in, and a basic sling is included. The soft rubber butt pad helps to tame recoil.

The KSG receiver is made from hardened steel and includes the magazine tubes which have been welded in place. The grip and stock assembly is made of glass reinforced nylon (Zytel) and is easily disassembled by pushing out 2 pins, which store in 2 holes in the grip when removed. The barrel and pump assembly is removed by loosening the 2 front magazine tube nuts with a coin and sliding the assembly forward.

title: For Sale:  Kel-Tec SUB-2000
postcontent:
With the S&W 4006 Magazines
From the Kel-Tec Website: The SUB-2000 is a self-loading carbine for pistol cartridges. Different versions of the SUB-2000 will accept most modern handgun magazines; see below for a complete list. The SUB-2000 has a greatly enhanced accuracy and extended range compared to a handgun. The superior precision is also very useful against small or partially covered targets at shorter range. The amount of training to master the SUB-2000 is only a fraction of that required for a handgun. The SUB-2000 has been developed from our highly successful SUB-9 rifle. Although retaining some features of the old rifle, the SUB-2000 is a completely new design. Emphasis has been put on consumer safety, but without impeding the performance. Polymers are used to a large extent, resulting in increased durability and reduced price. The SUB-2000 is available in 9 mm Luger or .40 S&W calibers.

The bolt can be locked in the rear position by the operating handle. The main safety is of protected push bolt type disconnecting the trigger bar and interlocking the hammer and sear. By rotating the barrel upwards and back, the SUB-2000 can be reduced to a size of 16" x 7" to facilitate secure storage and utilize the internal deployment lock which is operated by a proprietary key. The rear sight is of aperture type and the fluorescent front sight can be adjusted for windage and elevation. The SUB-2000 can easily be disassembled for cleaning or inspection without tools.

The 9mm SUB-2000 can be configured in the following magazine types: GLK17, GLK19, S&W59, BERETTA92,  SIG226.

The .40 SUB-2000 can be configured in the following magazine types: GLK22, GLK23, BERETTA96, S&W4006, SIG226.

title: For Sale:  Springfield Armory XD-S 45
postcontent:
From the Springfield Armory Website: The XD-S® Single Stack from Springfield Armory® has forever changed what you can expect out of your daily carry pistol. Now all the features and power you’re used to in the XD® and XD(M)® lines can be had in the shockingly slim XD-S® Single Stack – a pistol that packs so easily you’ll forget it’s there.

The XD-S® is the first and only single-stack XD® from Springfield Armory®. In addition to the inherently slim nature of the design, the frame is a short sub-compact style, and the barrel is just 3.3 or 4.0 inches. The XD-S® Single Stack seems to disappear when you carry it, and pretty soon you’ll forget it’s even there.

The XD-S® Single Stack consistently astonishes and delights shooters on the range. Its comfortable ergonomics – complete with two interchangeable backstraps – allow it to work without punishing your hands. The fiber optic front sight and white-dot rear sight align quickly and provide a clear sight picture for accurate shooting. The trigger on the XD-S® Single Stack feels more like it belongs on a target pistol than a carry piece. Shooters who are used to difficult, heavy triggers on deep concealment pistols will be astounded at the smooth, crisp XD-S® Single Stack trigger.

Choosing a handgun for concealed carry doesn’t have to be a series of compromises anymore. You don’t have to settle for a larger gun to gain shooting comfort. Nor do you have to sacrifice features for power. And you certainly don’t have to carry a gun to the store that you’d rather not carry to the range. Put an XD-S® Single Stack in your hand today, and you’ll want to shoot it. Put it in your holster, and you’ll find that it’s Noticeably Unnoticeable™.

postcontent:
This is a like new Ruger SR22 with a factory threaded barrel.  The gun comes with two magazines, two different end caps for each magazine, and two different sized handgrips.  

It also includes an upgraded recoil spring assembly to a stainless steel rod with captured spring in place of the plastic rod with free spring.  

Also included is the threaded barrel adapter with wrench to change the cap for the adapter.

The final item that is included is a Fobus Holster with retention adjustable screw built specifically for the SR22.  
As you can see this gun has a number of extras thrown in on it, and is essentially a fully upgraded sr22.  You could put a laser on it or a flashlight too from the accessory rail under the barrel.  
I priced this at 350 because I need to sell it quickly. 
The gun has about 200-300 rounds through it, and runs beautifully.  Very comfortable to hold- fun to shoot, great to carry with included holster.

title: For Sale:  AR-15 electronic locking gun rack
postcontent:
Allows you to keep your rifle handy, literally available at the touch of a button.
But still keeps the weapon safe and secure. The action and trigger drop into the mechanism guard and the lock clamps around the handguard. The action cannot be cycled while it is in the rack. This is basically the same kind of setup as you see in many police vehicles. It's a great solution for hunters and sportsman who want to keep their rifle handy but don't want to have to worry about it if they step away from their vehicle for a bit. 
It can also be an awesome home defense solution as well. You can keep a loaded weapon within reach and not have to worry about the kids messing with it or somebody walking off with it.  Just provide 12volt power through a hidden momentary switch and it can unlock with the touch of a button that only you know where is. 
Please call text or e-mail anytime John REDACTED

title: For Sale:  Blast from the Past - Beretta Mod. 950BS in .25 ACP. ***FINAL REDUCTION***
postcontent: Beretta Mod. 950BS in .25 ACP. - Private sale of a neat older classic Beretta in good condition. Made in Italy. When I called Beretta, they advised the gun's serial number predates their record  keeping, and that based upon its features it had to have been manufactured sometime between 1950 and 1959. Bore is in excellent shape. I don't think it was shot much. Has a tip up barrel. Perfect gun for someone that is disabled, or has difficulty racking a slide (elderly, those with arthritis, small women etc...). You never rack the slide to shot this gun. You just drop a round in the tip up barrel, and once fired, it automatically cycles the next round. For a “mouse” gun, it has a large 8+1 capacity. Taurus also makes a small caliber tip barrel design, but has a much heavier trigger (due to being double action). The Beretta is only single action, (where the hammer resets due to the blowback from the fired cartridge, and not from pulling the trigger – The trigger only releases the hammer, which equals a light and smooth trigger). Very nice aged look. Nice, and small for concealed carry. Carry it with Hornady “magic” bullets, and it will be just as effective as a 40 caliber. I already have two (2) good shooting .25 acp caliber guns, and can't really justify keeping this one. Own a classic Beretta for only $155 (reduced). Private sale. Must be over 21, have a Florida D/L and be legally able to own a firearm. Sale will must take place at my office in Palm Harbor. Don't waste my time if you are not willing to sign a bill of sale, or won't allow me to make a copy of your Florida d/license. If you want to spend a little less, I am willing to keep the Beretta, and would sell one of my Ravens that is in like new condition (with box), with only about 150 rds through it for $130.00. I never had any type of malfunction/misfire with the Raven.

title: For Sale:  AR-15 electronic locking gun rack
postcontent:
Allows you to keep your rifle handy, literally available at the touch of a button.
But still keeps the weapon safe and secure. The action and trigger drop into the mechanism guard and the lock clamps around the handguard. The action cannot be cycled while it is in the rack. This is basically the same kind of setup as you see in many police vehicles. It's a great solution for hunters and sportsman who want to keep their rifle handy but don't want to have to worry about it if they step away from their vehicle for a bit. 
It can also be an awesome home defense solution as well. You can keep a loaded weapon within reach and not have to worry about the kids messing with it or somebody walking off with it.  Just provide 12volt power through a hidden momentary switch and it can unlock with the touch of a button that only you know where is. 
Please call text or e-mail anytime John (209) 620 6685
